COMPARISON

Durable vs Wix: AI Speed vs Established Giant

Durable generates complete websites in 30 seconds using AI. Wix has 15+ years of features and templates. They're completely different approaches.

Updated: January 2025 • 35+ hours of testing

Quick Answer

Durable for speed - if you need a functional website in under 5 minutes, nothing beats it. AI generates everything from a single prompt.

Wix for control - if you want to customize every pixel, use their massive template library, or need specific features, Wix wins.

Durable is AI-first. Wix is template-first with AI bolted on. Different philosophies.

MetricDurableWix
Speed 9.8 6.0
Ease of Use 9.0 8.0
Design Quality 7.5 8.5
Customization 7.0 9.0
AI Features 9.5 6.0
Templates 5.0 9.5
Features 7.0 9.5
CRM 9.0 7.0

Detailed Comparison

Speed

Durable is unmatched here. 30 seconds from prompt to published website. Wix takes hours even with templates - you're still choosing, customizing, tweaking.

Durable's AI generates copy, images, layout, everything. Wix's AI (ADI) helps but still requires manual work.

Templates & Design

Wix has 800+ designer templates. Durable has a handful of AI-generated layouts. If you want to browse and pick, Wix wins. If you want AI to create, Durable wins.

Wix templates can feel generic. Durable's AI creates unique designs every time, though quality varies.

AI Features

Durable is built on AI. Generates business names, copy, images, even CRM tasks. Wix added AI features but they feel bolted on - not core to the experience.

Durable's AI copywriting is impressive. Blog posts, ads, emails - all generated from your business info.

Features & Integrations

Wix wins on features. Booking systems, restaurants, hotels, memberships - they've seen it all. Durable has the essentials but isn't as comprehensive.

For standard business sites, Durable suffices. For specialized needs, Wix's app market has solutions.

Built-in CRM

Durable includes a solid CRM with AI-powered lead management. Wix has CRM features (ShoutOut) but it's an add-on, not integrated.

If lead management matters, Durable's approach is cleaner. Wix requires more setup.

Pricing

Similar pricing tiers. Both start around $15-20/month for basic plans. Premium plans get expensive on both.

Durable's speed might justify the cost for time-poor entrepreneurs. Wix's features justify it for complex sites.

When to Choose Each

Choose Durable if...

  • ✓ You need a site in under 5 minutes
  • ✓ You hate design decisions
  • ✓ Want AI to do everything
  • ✓ Building a simple business site
  • ✓ Value speed over perfection

Choose Wix if...

  • ✓ You want to browse templates
  • ✓ Need specialized features
  • ✓ Want full creative control
  • ✓ Building complex sites
  • ✓ Don't mind investing time

Final Verdict

Try Durable first if speed matters. You can have a live site before you finish reading this article.

Choose Wix if you need features Durable lacks or want template-based design control.

Start with Durable. It costs nothing to try. Switch to Wix only if Durable can't handle your needs.

Both have free trials. Test them head-to-head.

Try Free Now Try Wix Free

Frequently Asked Questions

Is Durable really faster than Wix?

Yes. Durable: 30 seconds. Wix: 2-4 hours minimum. Durable's AI eliminates decision-making.

Can I customize Durable sites?

Yes, but limited. You can edit text, images, sections. Full design control like Wix? No.

Which is better for SEO?

Tie. Both handle SEO well. Durable generates meta tags automatically. Wix has more manual SEO tools.

Is Wix's ADI as good as Durable's AI?

No. ADI (Wix's AI) is basic template matching. Durable's AI generates unique content and designs.

Can I migrate from Durable to Wix?

Not easily. You'd export content and rebuild in Wix. Plan for manual migration.
